i1.name: Pix,_Faerie_Companion
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Lulu''' is assisted by ''Pix'', an {{tip|untargetable}} faerie, who follows her around and fires a barrage of 3 bolts towards '''Lulu's''' target whenever she uses a [[basic attack]] {{tip|on-attack}}. Each bolt deals {{as|{{pp|5 to 39}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 5% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} to '''Lulu's''' attack target or to the first enemy they collide with, for a total of {{as|{{pp|5*3 to 39*3}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 15% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} on hitting a single enemy with all three bolts.
Casting {{ai|Help, Pix!|Lulu}} on an ally champion transfers ''Pix's'' help to them, causing him to fire the bolts dependent on their basic attacks.
''Pix'' returns to '''Lulu's''' side if she teleports a long distance and when the unit he's attached to exceeds her [[Pets#Leash range|leash range]].
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Lulu is assisted by Pix, an untargetable faerie, who follows her around and fires a barrage of 3 bolts towards Lulu's target whenever she uses a basic attack on-attack. Each bolt deals 5undefined − 39undefined (based on level) (+ 5% AP) magic damage to Lulu's attack target or to the first enemy they collide with, for a total of 5*3undefined − 39*3undefined (based on level) (+ 15% AP) magic damage on hitting a single enemy with all three bolts.
Casting Lulu's Help, Pix! on an ally champion transfers Pix's help to them, causing him to fire the bolts dependent on their basic attacks.
Pix returns to Lulu's side if she teleports a long distance and when the unit he's attached to exceeds her Pets#Leash range.
i1.notes:
* ''Pix's'' bolts do not fire if the target is a structure. Structures will not intercept Pix's bolts.
* ''Pix's'' bolts do not fire alongside abilities that apply {{tip|on-hit}} effects (e.g. {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}}).
* ''Pix'' does not fire if the target dies.
* ''Pix'' consumes one stack of {{iis|Spellthief's Edge}} {{nie|Tribute}}.
* ''Pix'' fires from his own location and not from the unit he is following.
* ''Pix's'' damage is counted towards the champion he is currently helping.

q1.name: Glitterlance
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lulu''' and {{ai|Pix, Faerie Companion|Lulu|Pix}} each fire a magic bolt towards the target point, each one dealing {{as|magic damage}}, reduced to 70% against {{tip|minions}}, and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 80%, decaying over 2 seconds.
If an enemy is struck by both bolts, they take {{ccs|25% damage|magic}} from the second and the duration of the {{tip|slow}} is refreshed.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Lulu and Lulu's Pix each fire a magic bolt towards the target point, each one dealing magic damage, reduced to 70% against minions, and slowing them by 80%, decaying over 2 seconds.
If an enemy is struck by both bolts, they take Unknown value: ccs / 25% damage / magic from the second and the duration of the slow is refreshed.
leveling:
{{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|70 to 210}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}|Maximum Damage|{{ap|70*1.25 to 210*1.25}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}}}
{{st|Minion Damage|{{ap|70*.7 to 210*0.7}} {{as|(+ 28% AP)}}|Maximum Minion Damage|{{ap|70*0.875 to 210*0.875}} {{as|(+ 35% AP)}}}}

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 40% AP)
  • Maximum Damage: (+ 50% AP)
  • Minion Damage: (+ 28% AP)
  • Maximum Minion Damage: (+ 35% AP)

w1.name: Whimsy
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lulu''' can cast ''Whimsy'' on a target allied or enemy {{tip|champion}}, or herself.

{{sbc|Enemy Cast:}} '''Lulu''' launches a spell onto the target enemy champion that upon arrival {{tip|polymorph|polymorphs}} them into a harmless critter for a duration, during which their {{as|'''base''' movement speed}} is reduced by {{as|60|ms}}, and {{tip|disarm|disarming}} them for the same duration.

{{sbc|Self / Ally Cast:}} '''Lulu''' instantly casts erratic magic upon the target allied champion or herself, granting the target {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} and {{sti|ms|{{as|30%|ms}} {{as|(+ 5% per 100 AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for the next few seconds.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Lulu can cast Whimsy on a target allied or enemy champion, or herself.
Enemy Cast: Lulu launches a spell onto the target enemy champion that upon arrival polymorphs them into a harmless critter for a duration, during which their base movement speed is reduced by 60, and disarming them for the same duration.
Self / Ally Cast: Lulu instantly casts erratic magic upon the target allied champion or herself, granting the target bonus attack speed and 30% (+ 5% per 100 AP) bonus movement speed for the next few seconds.

effects.str:
• Bonus Attack Speed: %
  • Duration:

e1.name: Help,_Pix!
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lulu''' can cast ''Help, Pix!'' on a target ally or enemy, or herself.

{{sbc|Enemy Cast:}} '''Lulu''' sends {{ai|Pix, Faerie Companion|Lulu|Pix}} to the far side of the target enemy for 4 seconds, dealing them {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|true sight|revealing}} them for the same duration.

{{sbc|Self / Ally Cast:}} '''Lulu''' sends {{ai|Pix, Faerie Companion|Lulu|Pix}} to the target ally for 6 seconds, granting them a {{tip|shield}} for {{fd|2.5}} seconds if they are a {{tip|champion}}. '''Lulu''' may cast ''Help, Pix!'' upon herself to bring {{ai|Pix, Faerie Companion|Lulu|Pix}} back and grant herself the shield.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Lulu can cast Help, Pix! on a target ally or enemy, or herself.
Enemy Cast: Lulu sends Lulu's Pix to the far side of the target enemy for 4 seconds, dealing them magic damage and revealing them for the same duration.
Self / Ally Cast: Lulu sends Lulu's Pix to the target ally for 6 seconds, granting them a shield for 2.5 seconds if they are a champion. Lulu may cast Help, Pix! upon herself to bring Lulu's Pix back and grant herself the shield.
e1.notes:
* ''Help, Pix!'' can be [[Self-targeted|self-cast]].
* {{tip|spell shield|Spell shield}} and {{ai|Riposte|Fiora}} will block the damage but '''Pix''' will still follow regardless.
* ''Pix'' will continue to assist the target ally for the full duration even if the shield breaks (the same applies for the shield if the target ally leaves ''Pix's'' leash range).
* ''Pix's'' {{ai|Glitterlance|Lulu}} bolt can be fired while he is away from '''Lulu''' from his location and towards the cursor (effectively extending {{ais|Glitterlance|Lulu}} range).

r1.name: Wild_Growth
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lulu''' enlarges the target allied {{tip|champion}} or herself for 7 seconds, {{tip|airborne|knocking up}} all enemies near the target at the time of cast for {{fd|0.75}} seconds and granting the target {{as|{{sti|health|'''bonus''' health}}}}, 40% increased [[size]] and an [[aura]] that {{tip|slow|slows}} nearby enemies for the duration, lingering for {{fd|0.25}} seconds.
r1.descriptionHtml: Active: Lulu enlarges the target allied champion or herself for 7 seconds, knocking up all enemies near the target at the time of cast for 0.75 seconds and granting the target bonus health, 40% increased size and an aura that slows nearby enemies for the duration, lingering for 0.25 seconds.
r1.notes:
* ''Wild Growth's'' {{sti|health|{{as|'''bonus''' health}}}} is not affected by {{tip|Grievous Wounds}} and its resulting health restoration will persist after the duration ends.
* ''Wild Growth's'' size increase scales additively with other size increases.

effects.str:
• Bonus Health: (+ 50% AP)
  • Slow: %
